blocks.heading: HCP Waypoint helps teams develop faster with reusable infrastructure configurations
Get Started
blocks.subheading: Learn how to use Waypoint templates and add-ons in HCP Waypoint.

tutorialCards.description: Set up your HCP organization and project and activate HCP Waypoint.
tutorialCards.heading: Get started with HCP Waypoint

tutorialCards.description: Set up role based access control (RBAC) for HCP Waypoint, which gives permission for platform teams to define pre-approved infrastructure, and developers to deploy it.
tutorialCards.heading: Set up RBAC

tutorialCards.description: Create a reusable Waypoint template that lets developers start new applications with a pre-populated GitHub repo and self-serve, pre-approved application infrastructure.
tutorialCards.heading: Create a Waypoint template

tutorialCards.description: Create a Waypoint application from a reusable template.
tutorialCards.heading: Use a Waypoint template

tutorialCards.description: Create a reusable Waypoint add-on that lets developers self-serve additional infrastructure for their applications.
tutorialCards.heading: Create an add-on

tutorialCards.description: Destroy a Waypoint application and the infrastructure associated with it.
tutorialCards.heading: Destroy application resources

product.name: Waypoint

metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

product.description: Learn to define your build, deploy, and release lifecycle with Waypoint.
